alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 11 at 2:32PM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Mountains, Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
